ðŸ“– Summary: PraisonAI is a production-ready Multi AI Agents framework designed for building and managing multi-agent LLM systems. It offers a low-code solution that emphasizes simplicity, customization, and effective human-agent collaboration. The framework supports features like automated agent creation, self-reflection, reasoning, multi-modal capabilities, and integration with tools like LangChain.
